features: One 40-count pack of BIC Xtra-Smooth Bright Edition No. 2 Mechanical Pencils With Erasers
Versatile 0.7mm medium point is ideal for a variety of everyday writing activities and a great addition to school supplies
BIC pencils with high-quality lead that doesn’t smudge and erases cleanly, so your work looks neat and professional
These lead pencils are always ready and never need sharpening; to advance the lead, simply click the built-in eraser
Great automatic pencil for school, with No. 2 lead that’s compatible with most standardized tests
body.description: Experience smooth, dark writing with BIC Xtra-Smooth No. 2 Mechanical Pencils with Erasers. These 0.7mm mechanical pencils have a medium point that’s ideal for a variety of everyday writing activities. They’re excellent mechanical pencils for school and come equipped with three pieces of No. 2 lead that’s compatible with most standardized tests. The high-quality lead in these BIC pencils doesn’t smudge and erases cleanly, so your work looks neat and professional. Convenient and reliable, BIC Xtra-Smooth Number 2 Mechanical Pencils are always ready and never need sharpening; to advance the pencil lead, simply click the built-in eraser.These BIC mechanical pencils have a sophisticated, modern look, and their colorful clips easily attach to pockets, notebooks and more. The No. 1 selling mechanical pencil brand in the United States*, BIC offers dependable performance and value that you can trust. Looking for larger quantities of school or office supplies? This 40-count pencils bulk pack will keep your desk stocked all year. Choose BIC Xtra-Smooth No. 2 Mechanical Pencils With Erasers for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales, 12ME June 2022 combined.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smooth Sailing What's better than a smooth-writing mechanical pencil? What about a smooth writing mechanical pencil that doesn't smudge? BIC Mechanical Pencils deliver a buttery smooth writing experience and won't smudge on you. Lefties rejoice! Clean Up Your Act Smudges left behind after erasing? Couldn't be us. BIC Mechanical Pencil graphite writes smoothly and erases cleanly so your errors will never leave a trace. You're free to make mistakes as your write your essay, finish a math problem, doodle or take notes. Good Choice for Standardized Tests When it’s test time, BIC Mechanical Pencils are always sharp, at the ready and will last for lengthy standardized tests and then some. Better yet? These #2 pencils are refillable, so you can add more graphite and erasers as you use them. The Mechanical Pencil Everyone Knows and Loves You love us, you really love us! BIC mechanical pencils are the #1 selling pencils in the United States and for good reason. They write smoothly, erase cleanly, are perfect for testing, sketching and drawing. (Plus they look really sleek.) You can use them at school, in the office or at home.

Xtra Precision Xtra Smooth/Xtra Sparkle Xtra Strong Xtra Comfort Lead Color Graphite Graphite Graphite Graphite Point Sizes Available 0.5mm 0.7mm 0.9mm 0.5mm, 0.7mm Comfort Grip Available ✓ Built-In Durable Eraser ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Advance Mechanism Push Eraser Push Eraser Push Eraser Push Eraser Refillable ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mechanical pencils at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: These mechanical pencils are awesome! Easy to hold and write. Already had lead, so put them to use as soon as we got these. Most of all, the price is really good and seller shipped super fast. Bought these for my daughter and she loved these pencils. I will buy more for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and no big complaints.
reviews.reviewText: I was stunned at the price for a big pack of pencils like this. They are great for the school year. Very smooth, good quality graphite, easy to use. Love the bright colors. The only complaint I have is they aren't very ergonomic. I assume hands will get sore after holding the pencil for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best brand for mechanical pencils
reviews.reviewText: My high schooler prefers mechanical pencils to a standard pencil. We’ve discovered that not all are the same. First, many have a quite thin lead. They just break off constantly. These have a thicker lead so don’t have that problem. Some only come with one extra lead so after that’s used, they go in the trash. These have several extra leads included so again, superior to other brands. They are slightly more money than the cheap brands but for the quality/quantity of lead, they are definitely a better choice. Still very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Mechanical Pencil Revolution
reviews.reviewText: As someone who relies heavily on the written word, I recently embraced a new level of precision and convenience with mechanical pencils that have genuinely transformed my writing experience. These mechanical pencils offer a seamless blend of innovation and design, elevating the act of writing to a whole new level.From the moment I first held these mechanical pencils, I could feel the difference in quality. The sleek and ergonomic design fits perfectly in my hand, allowing for hours of comfortable writing without any strain. The materials used are not only durable but also lightweight, making these pencils a joy to use for both short notes and extended writing sessions.What truly sets these mechanical pencils apart is their precision. The fine lead options available ensure that every line I draw or write is sharp, clean, and consistent. Whether I'm working on intricate sketches, detailed math problems, or just jotting down notes, the mechanical pencils deliver a level of accuracy that traditional pencils can't match. The lead advances with a satisfying click, eliminating the need for constant sharpening and allowing me to focus on the task at hand.One of the standout features is the built-in eraser. The convenience of having an eraser right at the end of the pencil is a game-changer. No more searching for a separate eraser or smudging mistakes – the integrated eraser provides a quick and efficient way to make corrections without interrupting the flow of my work.The mechanical pencils also shine in terms of customization. The adjustable lead hardness options cater to different preferences and writing styles. Whether you prefer a softer lead for smooth writing or a harder lead for precise lines, these pencils have you covered.The versatility of these mechanical pencils extends beyond writing. The sleek design and compact size make them easy to carry around, ensuring that you're always equipped for any writing task that comes your way. Whether it's a business meeting, a creative brainstorming session, or simply jotting down a moment of inspiration, these mechanical pencils are your reliable companions.In conclusion, these mechanical pencils have taken my writing experience to new heights. Their precision, comfort, and versatility make them an indispensable tool for anyone who values the written word. If you're seeking a writing instrument that offers the perfect combination of innovation and design, these mechanical pencils are a must-try. Embrace the world of precision and perfection – your writing will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value - Great Product
reviews.reviewText: You get 40 pencils for less than $7.00. The pencils are thinner than their more expensive cousins, but that is the only difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I mean, they work
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed. The eraser does erase cleanly and without any smudges or stray marks. The lead is perfect for writing small print math problems on college-ruled paper. Here is my lead breakdown:0.3 mm - Perfect for writing as small as possible on note cards or note sheets for exams (cram as much information as possible on the permitted note medium). Difficulty: this thin diameter lead breaks with minimal pressure. I go through a lot of lead when writing exam note cards so this diameter is not recommended for regular use. This was a common size for engineering/drafting years ago.0.5 mm - The lead size in this product. PERFECT for someone with decent hand pressure control or someone who has plenty of extra lead on hand. The pencil writes fine while still being sturdy enough for my creaky hand.0.7 mm - Sturdy, but writes very mushy. Fine for writing words and doodling and probably acceptable for higher-level math on wide-ruled paper but gets a little "squishy" fitting equations on one line of college-ruled. I find myself frequently rotating the pencil or even intentionally breaking lead to try and find a sharper edge.0.9 mm - Perhaps fine (and even preferred) for younger students but 0.7 mm is bad enough for higher-level math that I'd never use this lead.I've included a photo that compares the 0.3 mm, 0.5 mm, and 0.7 mm pencil leads (I do not own a 0.9 mm pencil) on standard college-ruled paper. The 0.5 mm example demonstrates a pencil from this set. The comparison should be enough to determine which thickness is right for you. I also erased and rewrote one of the numbers on this example, using the eraser of this particular product. As you can see, it erases very cleanly. See if you can guess what was erased!Long story short: Excellent pencils with fine lead and quality erasers for CHEAP!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids love and only use these mechanical pencils. Great price too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a good all 'round pencil.
reviews.reviewText: Why pay a fortune for a mechical pencil. They get the job done at a good price.
these were a great purchase and definitely worth your money. the quantity is insane and they don't break easily. they aren't uncomfortable to use I highly recommend!
Llegó todo bien como en la foto y en el tiempo prometido.
Muy buena opción para este inicio de clases. A mis hijos les gusta más los lapiceros que el lápiz y aproveche comprarlos a muy buen precio.

My teenage daughters use a lot of pencils during the school year. They like these, as they’re easy to hold, cost effective, and the 0.7 mm lead doesn’t break as easily. I just wish that they didn’t lose their pencils so often.
